Articles.Content:
As you may know, in the southern hemisphere it's Friday. And everyone except me is looking forward to the weekend. Wanna know why?

Chores, that's why. And I'm the only one who's actually going to be doing them. Any ideas on how to cope with a weekend in shambles?

Take a walk? Read a book? not sure, I just kind of trudge along doing my chores for the day and then enjoying the rest of my day. Just work hard, don't complain, and do it. Faster it gets done, quicker you can be done.
